What will AI be capable of tomorrow?

We're building a foundational large language model featuring an infinite context window. Our breakthrough in AI training enhances understanding and processing capabilities, offering deeper, more insightful AI solutions across diverse industries.

### Frequently Asked Questions
- What sets Manifest AI's model apart? Our model's infinite context window allows for unparalleled depth in understanding and response accuracy.

- How does the infinite context window benefit users? It enables more precise and comprehensive responses, ideal for complex tasks and human-like interactions.

- What industries can use Manifest AI's technology? Various sectors including healthcare, finance, education, and customer service benefit from our deep data processing AI.

### Who are we?

[Carles Gelada]() and [Jacob Buckman]() are the co-founders who met at Google Brain, where they have been collaborating for over five years. Gelada, with significant contributions as a Research Scientist at OpenAI, has 1,300 citations to his name. Buckman, a PhD candidate at McGill University, complements this with 1,500 citations for his research. Their joint expertise continues to make waves in AI research.
